content.question: What is the volume of the solid generated when the region bounded by the graph of <math alttext="y equals, 2 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, the horizontal line <math alttext="y equals 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis is revolved about the horizontal line <math alttext="y equals 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

topic.text: 8.10: Volume with Disc Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
